Description: RARE+++ 1970's Vintage Soviet Molnija/Molnia Engraved, Oversized Men's wristwatch 18 Jew. *SERVICED* No Reserved Price!!! Dear customers, we present for sale this pre-owned gorgeous mega rare vintage Soviet Molnija Oversized wristwatch. This wristwatch is in excellent working condition. Keeps correct time!!! It dates from around the early 1970's. If you have been collecting watches for a while, I think you’re going to appreciate the following sophisticated antique timepiece that is hard to find nowadays. This watch is prized for reliability, convenience in use, and meets relatively seldom. A great investment! This elegant wristwatch was converted from pocket watch!!! MOVEMENT : This beautiful mechanical wristwatch has the high grade, original pocket watch movement ''MOLNIJA'' with 18 ruby jewels. In an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. Smooth and strong running of the balance. Movement has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time! This high grade movement is Cyrillic signed that reads : '' 18 JEWELS 3602 SU#129906 ''. See the photos for more details!!! CASE : This astonishing timepiece has Engraved Oversized case! Made of chrome/nickel. Case converted from pocket watch!!! Recently Engraved! The case is in good overall cosmetic condition, with soft signs of age and regular wear. The watch supplied with a brand new leather strap as a Free Gift to the buyer. The case have crown for winding and setting at 12 o'clock position. See the photos for more details!!! The large winding crown is in very good shape and operates properly! Diameter watch without the crown: 43 mm.Diameter watch with the crown: 47 mm.Thickness watch: 11,5 mm. These watches have originally been made in a variant of a pocket watch. And in a consequence have been altered in a variant for convenience of carrying on a hand!!! DIAL : This timepiece has, iron dial. In good overall cosmetic condition, no signs of any serious damages. The dial have black Arabic numerals and sub dial at 6 o'clock position. Cyrillic signed that reads : '' MOLNIJA / MADE IN USSR ''. The plastic dome crystal is changed with brand new one, because old one was in very worse condition! The white spots on the glass are only reflection of the light. Not damages!!! Look at the picture! You receive what you see!!!
